title.rendered: 25% Off Toys + Free Book + Instagram + New John Green

content.rendered:
Toy Sale

Our toy sale is off to a great start! This year we have decided to go bigger and better than ever by including ALL toys. We carry a wide variety of toys including Crazy Aarons Thinking Putty, Melissa & Doug, and our newest line, Mad Mattr.

 

Free Halloween Book

Kids who come in wearing their Halloween costume on Saturday, October 28th to our Macon and Warner Robins locations will receive a FREE copy of It’s the Great Pumpkin, Charlie Brown. Promotion is good for ages 0-8. One free book per family. While supplies last!

 

Instagram

We have reached over 100 followers on our new Instagram page! Follow us for a chance to hear about events, promotions, new titles, and other news.

 

New John Green Book: Turtles All The Way Down

#1 bestselling author John Green returns with his first new novel since The Fault in Our Stars. We are so excited to offer signed copies to our customers!

excerpt.rendered: Our toy sale is off to a great start! This year we have decided to go bigger and better than ever by including ALL toys.
